trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanging"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeInserted"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeInserting"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeRemoved"></xref> and <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeRemoving"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanging"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeInserted"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeInserting"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeRemoved"></xref> and <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeRemoving"></xref> events.

trans-unit.source: The following C# code shows how to use the event handler.
trans-unit.target: O código do c# seguinte mostra como utilizar o processador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: ``` //Add a new event handler. XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.NodeInserted += new XmlNodeChangedEventHandler(NodeInsertedHandler); //Define the event handler. void NodeInsertedHandler(Object src, XmlNodeChangedEventArgs args) { Console.WriteLine("Node " + args.Node.Name + " inserted!!"); } ``` > [!NOTE] > If an operation is comprised of multiple actions, it results in multiple events.
trans-unit.target: ``` //Add a new event handler. XmlDocument doc = new XmlDocument(); doc.NodeInserted += new XmlNodeChangedEventHandler(NodeInsertedHandler); //Define the event handler. void NodeInsertedHandler(Object src, XmlNodeChangedEventArgs args) { Console.WriteLine("Node " + args.Node.Name + " inserted!!"); } ``` > [!NOTE]> Se uma operação é composta por várias ações, que resulta em vários eventos.

trans-unit.source: For example, an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.AppendChild%2A> call may have to remove the node being appended from its previous parent.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.AppendChild%2A>chamada poderá ter de remover o nó a ser anexado a partir do respetivo elemento principal anterior.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.AppendChild%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case you will see a `NodeRemoved` event followed by a `NodeInserted` event.
trans-unit.target: Neste caso, verá um `NodeRemoved` eventos seguido por um `NodeInserted` eventos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeChangedEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The old parent <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: O principal antigo <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The new parent <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: O novo elemento principal <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The old value of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: O valor antigo o <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeChangedAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeChangedAction"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating what type of node change event is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica o tipo de evento de alteração do nó está a ocorrer.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNodeChangedAction" name="XmlNodeChangedAction" href=""></xref> value describing the node change event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNodeChangedAction" name="XmlNodeChangedAction" href=""> </xref> evento de alteração de valor que descrevem o nó.

trans-unit.source: XmlNodeChangedAction Value
trans-unit.target: Valor de XmlNodeChangedAction

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descrição

trans-unit.source: Insert
trans-unit.target: Inserir

trans-unit.source: A node has been or will be inserted.
trans-unit.target: Um nó foi ou será inserido.

trans-unit.source: Remove
trans-unit.target: Remove

trans-unit.source: A node has been or will be removed.
trans-unit.target: Um nó foi ou será removido.

trans-unit.source: Change
trans-unit.target: Alteração

trans-unit.source: A node has been or will be changed.
trans-unit.target: Um nó foi ou será alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Action" name="Action" href=""></xref> value does not differentiate between when the event occurred (before or after).
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_Action" name="Action" href=""> </xref> valor não distingue entre quando o evento ocorreu (antes ou depois).

trans-unit.source: You can create separate event handlers to handle both instances.
trans-unit.target: Pode criar processadores de eventos separado para processar ambas as instâncias.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode*> after the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode*>depois de concluída a operação.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ParentNode" name="ParentNode" href=""></xref> after the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref uid="langword_csharp_ParentNode" name="ParentNode" href=""> </xref> depois de concluída a operação.

trans-unit.source: This property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the node is being removed.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o nó está a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: For attribute nodes this property returns the <xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute.OwnerElement*>.
trans-unit.target: Para nós de atributo esta propriedade devolve <xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute.OwnerElement*>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute.OwnerElement*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the new value of the node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o novo valor do nó.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the node.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor do nó.

trans-unit.source: This property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the node is neither an attribute nor a text node, or if the node is being removed.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o nó não é um atributo nem um nó de texto, ou se o nó está a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: If called in a <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanging"></xref> event, <xref uid="langword_csharp_NewValue" name="NewValue" href=""></xref> returns the value of the node if the change is successful.
trans-unit.target: Se a chamada <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanging"> </xref> evento, <xref uid="langword_csharp_NewValue" name="NewValue" href=""> </xref> devolve o valor do nó se a alteração é efetuada com êxito.

trans-unit.source: If called in a <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged"></xref> event, <xref uid="langword_csharp_NewValue" name="NewValue" href=""></xref> returns the current value of the node.
trans-unit.target: Se a chamada <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged"> </xref> evento, <xref uid="langword_csharp_NewValue" name="NewValue" href=""> </xref> devolve o valor atual do nó.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> that is being added, removed or changed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> que está a ser adicionado, removidas ou alteradas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNode" name="XmlNode" href=""></xref> that is being added, removed or changed; this property never returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlNode" name="XmlNode" href=""> </xref> que está a ser adicionada, removidas ou alteradas; esta propriedade nunca devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode*> before the operation began.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode*>antes da operação teve início.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.ParentNode*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ParentNode" name="ParentNode" href=""></xref> before the operation began.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref uid="langword_csharp_ParentNode" name="ParentNode" href=""> </xref> antes de iniciar a operação.

trans-unit.source: This property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the node did not have a parent.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o nó não tinha um elemento principal.

trans-unit.source: For attribute nodes this property returns the <xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute.OwnerElement*>.
trans-unit.target: Para nós de atributo esta propriedade devolve <xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute.OwnerElement*>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlAttribute.OwnerElement*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the original value of the node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor original do nó.

trans-unit.source: The original value of the node.
trans-unit.target: O valor original do nó.

trans-unit.source: This property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the node is neither an attribute nor a text node, or if the node is being inserted.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o nó não é um atributo nem um nó de texto, ou se o nó está a ser introduzido.

trans-unit.source: If called in a <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanging"></xref> event, <xref uid="langword_csharp_OldValue" name="OldValue" href=""></xref> returns the current value of the node that will be replaced if the change is successful.
trans-unit.target: Se a chamada <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanging"> </xref> evento, <xref uid="langword_csharp_OldValue" name="OldValue" href=""> </xref> devolve o valor atual do nó que será substituído se a alteração é efetuada com êxito.

trans-unit.source: If called in a <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged"></xref> event, <xref uid="langword_csharp_OldValue" name="OldValue" href=""></xref> returns the value of node prior to the change.
trans-unit.target: Se a chamada <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged"> </xref> evento, <xref uid="langword_csharp_OldValue" name="OldValue" href=""> </xref> devolve o valor do nó antes da alteração.
